name: MechaMagic: The Divide
description:
MechaMagic: The Divide is a cooperative 2D platforming game with the unique swap mechanic implemented into our level design. Each side represents a different theme, one being highly futuristic and dystopian and the other being whimsical and fantasy-themed.

In order to ensure the survival of both of their worlds, the players must work together to solve the puzzles, both working on either side of the keyboard.  The game may also be played as a very challenging one player game.
